name: vuepg
description: Vue2/3 通用式焦点管理工具

scripts.autobuild: npm run update:version && npm run git:fixup && npm run build
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:premajor: npm version premajor && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:preminor: npm version preminor && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:prepatch: npm version prepatch && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run autobuild && npm publish && git push

author: LemoFire
